articles.title: Elon Musk Bought Twitter After Then-CEO Refused To Ban Jet Tracker: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A seemingly simple decision by Parag Agrawal, former CEO of the social media platform previously known as Twitter, may have led to Elon Musk's eventual takeover in January 2022.
articles.content:
@ElonJet was an account run by a 21-year-old college student Jack Sweeney. (File)

articles.title: Saturn's Death Star-looking moon may have vast underground ocean - Phys.org
articles.description: Astronomers have found the best evidence yet of a vast, young ocean beneath the icy exterior of Saturn's Death Star lookalike mini moon.
articles.content:
Astronomers have found the best evidence yet of a vast, young ocean beneath the icy exterior of Saturn's Death Star lookalike mini moon.
